modName: Craft Door Trim, Window Trim, Shutters, Mini Blinds, Curtains, Crown Moulding
modShortDescription: If you want to live in true style, you need to be able to make your house a home! Finishing touches like window and door trim are a nice touch.
modDescription:
If you want to live in true style, you need to be able to make your house a home! Finishing touches like window and [door](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-doors/) trim are a nice touch. Curtains, shutters, crown moulding? You got those as well with this mod. Craft all of those things and survive in style.

Server side friendly, so just drop in and go.

## Changelog

The wrong .zip file has been corrected.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=11WbDguy_p5O_2vrV8IDSbIRVXZLdafSC)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22350-craft-door-trim-window-trim-shutters-miniblinds-curtains-crown-moulding/).

**Credits:** [Iceburg71](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/iceburg71/)
